1117812411946323970.text: Burner Wallet, the fifth xDai validator just validated its 10,000th block  As xDai gains adoption, we aim to increase the number of validators for the network to make it more secure and decentralized. Check out the latest validator intros below https://forum.poa.network/c/xdai-chain/validators-intro …https://twitter.com/austingriffith/status/1117796782396698624 …

1121436825678221313.text:
Excited to announce that @akropolisio has partnered up with POA and deployed their tokenized cashflows smart contracts on xDai  Thanks to xDai, Akropolis are moving towards better UX for end-user adoption. Check out the full announcement below

1119348675518402560.text: 2/3 When we launched POA Core, we created a network that provides speed and efficiency necessary for high transaction games and DApps. This is why @GeonNetwork and Geon coin deployed on it as POA allows for efficient processing of all geomining requests.https://forum.poa.network/t/geon-network-receives-grant-from-poa-games-fund/2348 …

1115667320914022400.text: 3/3 We have a ton of awesome applicants, and can’t wait to unveil the next award recipient. Stay tuned for that announcement....in the meantime you can learn more about the game fund and Eggforce here:https://forum.poa.network/t/introducing-50-000-dai-poa-games-fund/1974/8 …

1115667319316013056.text: 1/3 Two months ago we started the $50,000 POA Games fund initiative. We created this to help developers take their DApps to the next level and deploy them on POA Core. Today we officially announce our first $5000 award! Congratulations to Eggforce, a game by @EtherSnailFarm

1115667320121245696.text: 2/3 Thanks to the @GetGitcoin grants platform, the $5,000 Dai award process was seamless. $45,000 remains in the fund, and next we will select a project that just needs a little $$ boost to up their game while showcasing the strengths of the POA Core. https://forum.poa.network/t/introducing-50-000-dai-poa-games-fund/1974/8 …

1119249254101348352.text: POA is sponsoring and supporting the @gitcoin Ethereal Virtual Hackathon with THREE prize bounties The prizes are all of equal amount and will be awarded to the best games deployed on POA Core. Check it out and submit your project by April 30th https://forum.poa.network/t/poa-supports-the-ethereal-virtual-hackathon-with-three-bounties/2353 …

1119348684867510272.text: 3/3 With the grant @GeonNetwork will be promoting wider adoption and a healthy user base using channels directed at individuals outside the world of blockchain and cryptocurrencies   Find out more information below and download the app today https://forum.poa.network/t/geon-network-receives-grant-from-poa-games-fund/2348 …

1120764740022595584.text: Continuing our mission of making xDai more decentralized, we are happy to announce that @portis_io , an early supporter of xDai, has officially become the SIXTH validator Check out their application below and look out for more validators soon https://forum.poa.network/t/portis-as-an-xdai-validator/2116 …

1115255958626816000.text: POA is happy to support #RunEVM as a community sponsor and love seeing events like it that promotes sidechains and other topics going beyond Ethereum mainnet! 1116060914262904832.text: We launched the ETC Bridge to continue expanding our interoperability mission, introducing $WETC to create more liquidity and more use cases for ETC.
